2) L7007 Aegis Training and Readiness Center
2.2) L7007 Aegis Readiness Training Center Upgrade

Remarks.val: [L7007 Aegis Training and Readiness Center] FY13 and FY14 funding is for Advanced Capability Build-12 (ACB-12) equipment upgrades at the AEGIS Training and Readiness Center to support Fleet introduction and training of ACB-12.

Total lead time is 12 months, which includes administrative lead time (6 months) and production lead time (6 months).  Administrative lead time includes receipt of funds, document development, contracts review and vendor concurrence.

Description.val: Procurement and installation of Integrated Ship Controls for CG 47 Class ships
